container.heading: Grid Container
container.text: The grid component allows you to build CSS grids with components. It has 12 columns and an infinite amount of rows.

item.heading: Grid Item
item.text: The grid item is a container inside the grid. With the grid item we can choose at which lines the item should stretch. For example if we have 3 columns and what it to stretch all of them we write 1 as starting line and 4 as the end line.

gutter.heading: Gutter
gutter.text: We can insert a gutter between the grid items. The gutter allows the same options as spacing utility.
